title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file with another resource (e.g., a .properties file), the synchronization process fails.
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process does not complete successfully.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully synchronize the .java file with the selected resource.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource file (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
